title: JDBC Data Set Editor does not load tables and columns on demand
description: The JDBC Data Set Editor page for a SQL Query has a tree control that lists the tables and columns in your data source. Currently, when using the iSeries platform with the JTOpenJDBC drivers, the tree control shows every schema (aka catalog) on the system, which can be several hundred tables. Even with the schema filter implemented, I still encounter a warning message during the page load as the tree is being populated.
OB: On the iSeries platform using the JTOpenJDBC drivers, the tree control shows every schema on the system during page load, resulting in a warning message.
EB: The load of the tree should be deferred until the user expands it or applies a filter.
